analysis.file_summary: SEC Form 8-K filing documenting the merger agreement between Simplicity Bancorp, Inc. and HomeStreet, Inc. dated September 27, 2014. analysis.file_summary: DEF 14A merger proxy statement for Hewlett-Packard Company's acquisition of Aruba Networks, Inc.
